channel.title: Help with new serv.- cant compile-
channel.description:
right i go to the file where i see a picture of a cog..and it says.. compile classes.. i click on it.. a black box comes up saying... javac is not recognized ..
Help plz .. :(

item.source: Help with new serv.- cant compile-

item.title: Help with new serv.- cant compile-
item.dc:creator: @mrrules mrrules
item.description:
@mrrules wrote:

Yeah thats a good idea but here this is what you do…
Go toyour compile right click and go to edit a notepad will open erase whats in there and put this

@echo off COLOR 08 title YOURSERVERNAME Client "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\java.exe" server pause
in there instead of what was in there just change the 6 to what ever version of java you have then clsoe and save it then click on compile.If it worked it will say soemthing like api overided blah blah starting testscape that means it worked…hope it helps

Read full topic
